column1: manipulate data in R (filter and sort data sets, recode and compute variables)
column2: compute statistical indicators (mean, median, mode etc.)
column4: get statistical indicators by subgroups of the population
column7: create histograms and cumulative frequency charts
column8: build column charts, mean plot charts and scatterplot charts
column10: check the normality assumption for a data series
column11: detect the outliers in a data series
column12: perform univariate analyses (one-sample t test, binomial test, chi-square test for goodness-of-fit)]
